alert.note: Alert for Adams; Huntington; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:53AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Outlfow from strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Huntington, southeastern Wells, Adams and northeastern Jay Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 852 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a southward surging area of outflow winds near Bluffton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bluffton, Berne, Geneva, Monroe, Uniondale, Poneto, Vera Cruz, Trinity, Wellsburg, Murray, Liberty Center, Peterson, Buckeye, Domestic, Kingsland, Travisville, Craigville, Ceylon, Reiffsburg and North Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northeastern and east central Indiana...and west central Ohio.
